mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parttime_job_applicant (job_id, user_id, introduction) VALUES (#{jobId}, #{userId}, #{introduction})
mapper.select: SELECT a.applicant_id, a.job_id, a.user_id, a.introduction, a.created_at, u.email, u.phone FROM parttime_job_applicant a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.job_id = #{jobId} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC

SELECT a.applicant_id, a.job_id, a.user_id, a.introduction, a.created_at, u.email, u.phone FROM parttime_job_applicant a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.job_id = #{jobId} AND a.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM parttime_job_applicant WHERE job_id = #{jobId}

SELECT a.applicant_id, a.job_id, a.user_id, a.introduction, a.created_at, u.email, u.phone FROM parttime_job_applicant a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.job_id = #{jobId} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
